title: I just want to do my own runes in champ select and go into game with it.
body:
I know the new runes just came out and Riot doesn't want anyone going into game without any runes, but I seriously just want to do my own runes during champ select without having the client locking me onto the 'recommended' rune pages, so I have to switch out, go to my current rune page in attempt to finish it, then still going into game with the rune page it suggested me because I didn't finish it or save it or it didn't process. It's super annoying and I know I should make the rune page before hand but I'm jumping into draft even not knowing where I will be and just wanting to make the runes as I go.

Please make an option where it stops doing that lock thingy, because I just want to make my runes in peace having a hex flash on thresh instead of that recommended Resolve rune page without one.  I'm not the fastest rune page maker especially when it just came out :/ Just some feedback.

replies.body:
I mean the main issue is that Riot said that they would give us 15 extra seconds for Rune pages and shit....

Draft doesn't get any extra time added to it.
That's a bug we're fixing right now!  I feel ya, it's super annoying and we hope to get a fix out ASAP.
